```{r}
new_mean <- function(x) {
	n <- length(x)
	mean_value <- sum(x) / n
	return(mean_value)
}


```

```{r}
x <- c(1, 3, 5, 7, 9)
new_mean(x)
mean(x)
```
```{r}
square <- function(x) {
	squared_value <- x^2
	return(squared_value)
}

square(4)
square(36)
```
